theFirst:BasicAttack.NAME: Basic Attack
theFirst:BasicAttack.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Gain !B! Block. NL You are feeling [#666646]groggy...[]

theFirst:BasicDefend.NAME: Basic Defend
theFirst:BasicDefend.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL You hear [#666646]screams...[] in your mind.

theFirst:DrowsyAttack.NAME: Drowsy Attack
theFirst:DrowsyAttack.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Gain !B! Block. NL You are feeling [#666646]groggy...[]

theFirst:DrowsyDefend.NAME: Drowsy Defend
theFirst:DrowsyDefend.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL You hear [#666646]screams...[] in your mind.

theFirst:WokeAttack.NAME: Woke Attack
theFirst:WokeAttack.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Gain !B! Block. NL You are feeling [#666646]groggy...[]

theFirst:WokeDefend.NAME: Woke Defend
theFirst:WokeDefend.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL You hear [#666646]screams...[] in your mind.

theFirst:NocturnalMyoclonus.NAME: Nocturnal Strike
theFirst:NocturnalMyoclonus.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL If thefirst:Drowsy, gain that much Block.
theFirst:NocturnalMyoclonus.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL If thefirst:Drowsy, gain that much Block. NL Play the top card of your draw pile.

theFirst:WakeUpSlap.NAME: Wake-Up Slap
theFirst:WakeUpSlap.DESCRIPTION: Take !theFirst:Magic! damage. NL Draw a card. NL Gain !M! Strength this turn.

theFirst:ThornCloak.NAME: Cloak of Thorns
theFirst:ThornCloak.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Whenever you are attacked this turn, deal !M! damage back.

theFirst:ExtraArm.NAME: Extra Arm
theFirst:ExtraArm.DESCRIPTION: At the start of your turn, play a bonus attack.

theFirst:Reflect.NAME: Reflect
theFirst:Reflect.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you are attacked this turn, reflect 30% of the damage.

theFirst:TheSeed.NAME: The Seed
theFirst:TheSeed.DESCRIPTION: Add a thefirst:Seed to your deck. NL Removed from your deck after playing.

theFirst:Seed.NAME: Seed
theFirst:Seed.DESCRIPTION: Blossoms after being played 5 times. NL (Currently has been played !M! times)

theFirst:ExplosivesCache.NAME: Explosives Cache
theFirst:ExplosivesCache.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage, but shuffle a thefirst:Bomb into your draw pile.

theFirst:Bomb.NAME: Bomb
theFirst:Bomb.DESCRIPTION: Unplayable. NL At the end of your turn, take 10 damage. NL Ethereal.

theFirst:Detonator.NAME: Detonator
theFirst:Detonator.DESCRIPTION: Unplayable. NL When drawn, deal !D! damage to all enemies.

theFirst:BombToss.NAME: Bomb Toss
theFirst:BombToss.DESCRIPTION: Shuffle a thefirst:Detonator into your draw pile X times.

theFirst:Dream.NAME: Dream
theFirst:Dream.DESCRIPTION: Add thefirst:Yawn and thefirst:Stretch to your discard pile. Play both to wake up a little.
theFirst:Dream.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Add thefirst:Yawn+ and thefirst:Stretch+ to your discard pile. Play both to wake up a little.

theFirst:Yawn.NAME: Yawn
theFirst:Yawn.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL More powerful if played with thefirst:Stretch. NL Exhaust.

theFirst:Stretch.NAME: Stretch
theFirst:Stretch.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL More powerful if played with thefirst:Yawn. NL Exhaust.

theFirst:Nightmare.NAME: Nightmare
theFirst:Nightmare.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Deals !M! additional damage for each thefirst:Drowsy. NL Reduce thefirst:Drowsy by !theFirst:Magic!.

theFirst:Insomnia.NAME: Insomnia
theFirst:Insomnia.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Gain !M! additional Block for each thefirst:Drowsy. NL Reduce thefirst:Drowsy by !theFirst:Magic!.

theFirst:SleepParalysis.NAME: Sleep Paralysis
theFirst:SleepParalysis.DESCRIPTION: Negate the first !M! attacks this turn. NL End your turn.

theFirst:Lullaby.NAME: Lullaby
theFirst:Lullaby.DESCRIPTION: ALL enemies lose !M! Strength. NL Exhaust.
theFirst:Lullaby.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: ALL enemies lose !M! Strength. Apply !theFirst:Magic! Weak to ALL enemies. NL Exhaust.

theFirst:Taunt.NAME: Taunt
theFirst:Taunt.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL ALL enemies gain !M! Strength.

theFirst:ImagineSkill.NAME: Imagine: Skill
theFirst:ImagineSkill.DESCRIPTION: Draw a card. If you draw a Skill, Refund this card's cost.
theFirst:ImagineSkill.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Draw two cards. For each Skill, Refund this card's cost.

theFirst:ImagineAttack.NAME: Imagine: Attack
theFirst:ImagineAttack.DESCRIPTION: Draw a card. If you draw a Attack, Refund this card's cost.
theFirst:ImagineAttack.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Draw two cards. For each Attack, Refund this card's cost.

theFirst:ImaginePower.NAME: Imagine: Power
theFirst:ImaginePower.DESCRIPTION: Draw a card. If you draw a Power, Refund this card's cost.
theFirst:ImaginePower.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Draw two cards. For each Power, Refund this card's cost.

theFirst:RecurringDream.NAME: Recurring Dream
theFirst:RecurringDream.DESCRIPTION: Select a card in your hand. NL Draw all copies of it in your draw pile.
theFirst:RecurringDream.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Select a card in your hand. NL Draw all copies of it in your draw pile and discard pile.

theFirst:EnergyShift.NAME: Energy Shift
theFirst:EnergyShift.DESCRIPTION: Select a card. NL This turn, it costs !M! less.

theFirst:Offering.NAME: Offering
theFirst:Offering.DESCRIPTION: Discard a card. NL Play a new card based on the discarded card type.
theFirst:Offering.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Discard a card. NL Play a new upgraded card based on the discarded card type.

theFirst:Sleepwalk.NAME: Sleepwalk
theFirst:Sleepwalk.DESCRIPTION: Unplayable. NL Deal !D! to a random enemy when drawn.

theFirst:Comfortable.NAME: Comfortable
theFirst:Comfortable.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Unplayable. NL Gain [E] and 1 Artifact when drawn.

theFirst:SideSleeper.NAME: Side Sleeper
theFirst:SideSleeper.DESCRIPTION: The leftmost card in your hand ALWAYS costs !M!.

theFirst:BagOfShields.NAME: Bag of Shields
theFirst:BagOfShields.DESCRIPTION: thefirst:Passive. NL Block is not removed at the start of your turn.

theFirst:SpectralDefender.NAME: Spectral Defender
theFirst:SpectralDefender.DESCRIPTION: thefirst:Passive. NL At the end of your turn, double your Block.

theFirst:ToughSkin.NAME: Tough Skin
theFirst:ToughSkin.DESCRIPTION: thefirst:Passive. NL At the start of your turn, gain !M! Block.

theFirst:StrongFooting.NAME: Strong Footing
theFirst:StrongFooting.DESCRIPTION: If you have !M! or less Block, double your Block.

theFirst:StoneHearth.NAME: Stone Hearth
theFirst:StoneHearth.DESCRIPTION: Deal between !D! and !M! damage to a random enemy and gain that much Block.

theFirst:InducedDream.NAME: Induced Dream
theFirst:InducedDream.DESCRIPTION: Look at 3 cards in your draw pile, choose 1 and add a copy of it to your hand. NL Exhaust.

theFirst:InducedMemory.NAME: Induced Memory
theFirst:InducedMemory.DESCRIPTION: Look at 3 cards in your draw pile, choose 1 to draw. NL Exhaust.

theFirst:LingeringDoubt.NAME: Lingering Doubt
theFirst:LingeringDoubt.DESCRIPTION: If this card hasn't been played by the end of battle, lose !theFirst:Magic! Max HP. NL Exhaust.

theFirst:Sloth.NAME: Sloth
theFirst:Sloth.DESCRIPTION: Start battles with !theFirst:Magic! additional thefirst:Drowsy. NL Lose !theFirst:Magic! thefirst:Drowsy when played.

theFirst:Insomniac.NAME: Insomniac
theFirst:Insomniac.DESCRIPTION: thefirst:Passive. NL At the start of battle, shuffle a thefirst:Sleepwalk into your draw pile !M! times.

theFirst:EntombedWeapon.NAME: Entombed Blade
theFirst:EntombedWeapon.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Cannot be upgraded normally. NL Play !M! more times to upgrade this card.

theFirst:RunTheGamut.NAME: Run The Gamut
theFirst:RunTheGamut.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Cannot be played if you've played fewer than 10 cards this turn.
theFirst:RunTheGamut.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to all enemies. NL Cannot be played if you've played fewer than 10 cards this turn.

theFirst:RecklessBlow.NAME: Reckless Blow
theFirst:RecklessBlow.DESCRIPTION: Additionally costs 10 Block. NL Deal !D! damage.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: I need more #yBlock to use this.

theFirst:ShieldToss.NAME: Shield Toss
theFirst:ShieldToss.DESCRIPTION: Remove all your Block. NL For every 10 Block, deal !D! damage to a random enemy.

theFirst:FalseNap.NAME: False Nap
theFirst:FalseNap.DESCRIPTION: Can only be played if no other card has been played. NL Deal !D! damage. NL Apply !M! Vulnerable.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: I have already played a card this turn.

theFirst:CountingSheep.NAME: Counting Sheep
theFirst:CountingSheep.DESCRIPTION: thefirst:Search - Attack NL Deal !D! damage to all enemies for each card searched.

theFirst:Mulligan.NAME: Mulligan
theFirst:Mulligan.DESCRIPTION: Shuffle your hand and discard pile into your draw pile, then redraw your hand. NL Exhaust.

theFirst:FullGuard.NAME: Full Guard
theFirst:FullGuard.DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! Block for each card played this turn.

theFirst:NightTerror.NAME: Night Terror
theFirst:NightTerror.DESCRIPTION: Stun and deal !D! damage to a random enemy.

theFirst:Hallucinations.NAME: Hallucinations
theFirst:Hallucinations.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Permanently gain !theFirst:Magic! damage the first time played each combat. NL thefirst:Snooze.

theFirst:SelectiveMemory.NAME: Selective Memory
theFirst:SelectiveMemory.DESCRIPTION: Choose a card in your hand. Remove that card and this card from your deck.

theFirst:FocusedStrike.NAME: Focused Strike
theFirst:FocusedStrike.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL If you are not thefirst:Drowsy, deal !D! damage again.

theFirst:ForcedThought.NAME: Forced Thought
theFirst:ForcedThought.DESCRIPTION: thefirst:Search - Any NL (Choose to search for an attack, a skill, or a power card)

theFirst:GamblersDream.NAME: Gambler's Dream
theFirst:GamblersDream.DESCRIPTION: Wager 10% of your gold. NL Exhaust.

theFirst:Scavenge.NAME: Scavenge
theFirst:Scavenge.DESCRIPTION: If you have more than !M! attacks in your discard, deal !D! damage.
theFirst:Scavenge.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: If you have more than !M! attacks in your discard, deal !D! damage. NL If you have more than !M! skills, gain !B! Block.
